website_summaries.verdict: Small, with clear focus within its stated range, make these binoculars a must-have for budget-minded hunters.
pros: Clear view out to hundreds of yards, with accurate focus
Small but comfortable to hold for most
cons: Optics are not up to par with much higher-priced models (which is to be expected)
Exterior lenses can fog easily in wet conditions
Some reports of water leaking into housing
Neck strap is thin and uncomfortable to wear

customer_reviews.title: Too many negatives....
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk if you have any experience with a good pair of binoculars. Glass is not crisp and clear resulting in poor image quality. Focus adjustment is poor at best. You just cannot get a good crisp focus which results is a blurred image. Very limited adjustment for eye width. If your eyes are close together or far apart you cannot get enough adjustment for proper viewing. On the plus side, they do look good. Sending them back to Amazon. Overall, I would not recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LSands

customer_reviews.title: THE BINOCULARS THEMSELVES ARE GREAT, BUT THE CANVAS CARRYING CASE IS WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: These Bushnell PowerView 10x50 binoculars themselves are pretty decent for the price, but the canvas carrying case that ships with it is worthless - its way too large for a snug fit of the binoculars (they flop around inside the case), and the velcro on the inside of flap that folds over the front of the case for closure doesn't even line-up with the velcro on the body of the case, hence you can't secure the flap. Its basically a joke! The binoculars themselves are worth a four to five star rating, but the case rates a 0-1 rating, so the best I can offer on these is a four star. Sorry Bushnell!
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: disappointed for the brand
customer_reviews.text: I was a little let down by these as Bushnell makes great products. These binoculars fog easily, and water easily penetrates and getting inside the housing. Amazon was great with customer service and sent out brand new ones via priority shipping. So might of been a bad set
customer_reviews.author: Brnnoser

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Birthday gift for my husband, who uses them for birding and he LOVES them. Our son borrowed them and liked them so much that I'm getting him his own pair for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an upgrade. My old binoculars had seen their better days. We enjoy watching the wildlife at our home. Except for the rare sighting of a bear or skunk. Ugh. Anyway....do not be nervous about ordering these. A fine little item.
customer_reviews.author: Medic 357

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Use them for archery hunting and it's made it so much easier to spot and identify what's coming. They also work well before and well after you could shoot. At least in my opinion. Only complaint is, when I bought them they weren't on Amazon prime and it took them forever to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan.

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars. They were sold out and I got ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Binoculars. They were sold out and I got the last pair of used ones Amazon had. I got it quickly and it was in perfect condition. didn't see any signs of use. love the focusing bar in the middle instead of the usual turning the nob. Focus is real clear and bright. the only knock is the strap is thin and weak, it will do the job but thin. Other then that it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: The Gluts

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I waited on reviewing these until deer season was over. Had no issues other than some outside fogging from my breath which is not the fault of the bino's. Would by again
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great set of binos, for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the clarity and the feel of them. I compared it to my buddy’s $1200 set of vortex and I couldn’t tell a difference, if anything mine were a little sharper at farther distance. You can definitely tell the difference of birds, or how many tines on the buck at 150+ yards no problem. The adjuster is a little different to get use to but it’s quick and easy. The strap is kinda cheesy, only about 3/4 inch wide and will definitely cause neck fatigue for any extended period of hiking or glassing. I bought the chest harness that Bushnell makes and it feels very comfortable with these binos. All in all VERY good for low price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to focus excellent accessories.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent Bino's. The quick adjust works like a charm and and holds its focus great. I love the strap and bag. I bought these for my son and I have the Perma-Focus. (same brand) Mine came with a strap that has more of a plastic feel and his is a nice strap material. The bag has a nice canvas feel and feels very tear resistant. My perma-focus bag feels more like soft foam that will tear very easily.
customer_reviews.author: RKDad

customer_reviews.title: Good quality binoculars at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Look, feel, and work great, and good price for such a high quality set of Bushnell's. The 10 x 50mm PowerView's are exactly what I wanted for nature-watching. Being a former hunter, I can say they'd be great for hunting too. Like the zoom feature. Don't see any negatives. Highly recommend for use up to 100 yards.
customer_reviews.author: DonCro2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Optics
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for good binoculars for a long time. The InstaFocus lever intrigued me - and ultimately turned out to be a game-changer. The ability to focus is so simple and the clarity is amazing. You won't find better optics at this price point. I showed these to my b-i-l who discovered he could clearly see all distinguishing features on geese nesting on an island 260 meters / 285 yds away. He pulled out his phone and ordered the same pair within 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: MFC7

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars were a gift for our son who is an avid hunter and wildlife watcher. He absolutely loves these binoculars. Please don't hesitate to purchase these. Outstanding quality !!!! Buying another set for my husband who also hunts.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Reidinger

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these binoculars! Got them to use on our very first African safari and it didn’t disappoint. Very easy to use and sheer. I used an adapter to take close up pictures, it worked well (I even got a very nice shot of Mt Kilimanjaro from our plane window!). Overall I’m very happy with my purchase and I can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amile & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: PowerView binoculars are a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good binoculars for general use, but not of the high quality needed for hunting. The eyepieces are a little small but the clarity is sharp and they are very easy to focus. Great for wildlife viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing focus and clarity
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck! Very clear and focusing is great. Use them for bow hunting and I love them. They work great when looking into the woods and focusing on what you want to see.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Nicholas Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Clear view
customer_reviews.text: Received these today. Compared them to my Tasco. Much clearer lens view. Easy to adjust focus. Wide field of view. Will definitely recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: bigpoppy

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Colorado and bought to look at wildlife in the mountains. Comes with a case and covers for front and back lenses. Easy to focus, easy to carry (comes with neck strap). We love these.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money !the quick focus is nice when handing these back and forth between people. Your not going to see a mile with these, but for 600 yards or so they will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on others reviews. However when I got them they are very blurry. No matter how I adjust them they just won't work for me. Probably just a fluke. However I won't be purchasing anymore Bushnell Binos
customer_reviews.author: dustin massey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We are lovers of field trips and camping. This is one of the best gifts for my husband. The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Anzhelika Savenko

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Super clear. I was glassing deer from a mile away.
customer_reviews.author: RawHyde

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like the clarity and used at 200+ yards, worked great
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Understand what it is you are buying.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the use of the word "Instafocus" in the ad as a legitimate descriptive adjective for the binoculars because It led me to think Instafocus was another term for Autofocus or Focus free. When I received the the binoculars I was extremely disappointed to learn that they were manual focus glasses. I put them in return mail the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Steinbjorn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband for deer hunting. He had been using a cheaper pair that you could barely see out of. Everything is much clearer with these. He text me from the deer stand with much appreciation of this purchase
customer_reviews.author: misty D

customer_reviews.title: good quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these binoculars exceeded my expectations for their price point. Crisp, clear viewing with good brightness and easy focus.
customer_reviews.author: Casi Dougal

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Honestly very good clarity lens, strong and stylish.. love the piece.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Well made; work well
customer_reviews.text: Work very well! Very quick to adjust the focus. So quick in fact I would not pay the extra price for other binoculars that are auto-focus. I can focus these one-handed in less than 1 second.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a back up pair
customer_reviews.text: 5 months and one vacation with a large family, so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Rod NM

customer_reviews.title: Great distance and very clear
customer_reviews.text: These work great everything is clear and you can see from a great distance my husband got them for a Christmas present for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: We are so impressed with these. They work really well.
customer_reviews.author: Professional

customer_reviews.title: Good price / Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for me at their price point. I didn't have much money to spend and needed a quick set, I'm very satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: All it says and more. Very well put together and great sight picture. Clarity is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend these binoculars to others
customer_reviews.text: These are Bushnell binoculars and that means they are made well and are a quality product. I would highly recommend these binoculars to others.
customer_reviews.author: Randall McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Be aware shop prices before buying
customer_reviews.text: This product is sold for less on Bushnell website MSRP price is $60.99 1 star for price 1 star for product- is great quality nothing wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: DAF

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice binos. Can use for a whole day and don’t feel like my eyes are strained
customer_reviews.author: Tristin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Binoculars for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just got them. So far they are fantastic. My other binoculars had a slight double vision I put up with for years. With these I see perfect single image
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Very clear I used them for my hunt and was very pleased
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need for hunting, cant wait to field test these.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Presten

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of binoculars for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to South Africa and I am glad I did. Great optics, light and easy to use. I also got a super deal on the price. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: work great a little heavy but over all a great value
customer_reviews.author: Don C

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great binoculars for the price. Neck strap is a bit on the narrow side. If you were wearing these for several hours, I would consider buying a better carrying strap.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Whiteman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to adjust distance with the middle swivel knob. Clear visibility. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price and on time, not too bad for the money.
customer_reviews.author: straight shooter

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED!!
customer_reviews.text: We are Very satisfied with this item. It is more than we expected for the price. Delivery was also awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Craig A.Walters

customer_reviews.title: Stay dry.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear image when its nice out, I got caught out in some light rain once and now they are a piece of junk. Water leaked through into the inside lenses. Terrible if you plan to go out with a slight chance of rain. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: My first set and I love them! Much cheaper on Amazon then the sporting good stores too!
customer_reviews.author: J & R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Binoculars and feel great in your hands. Very sturdy feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Hunting!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really built great and I love the Awesome Camo Pattern on them also!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg W.

customer_reviews.title: Beach glasses
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning the lens with the cloth provided, when the lense fell inside the scope. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: irene Heffernan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the auto focus and the fact that theyre made in the usa
customer_reviews.author: kevan e.

customer_reviews.title: I love these for Bird watching with my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: I love these for Bird watching with my boyfriend, they are a little heavy but I love the clarity and they are easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for optics for the price. My buddy owns the property that I hunt and was impressed also....
customer_reviews.author: jeff e klause

customer_reviews.title: good deal for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money, not the best optic I have used, but works well for counting points on bucks out to 100 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Rory S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Friends asked where did you buy this??? AMAZON!!! Awesome product for the price....
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS A.

customer_reviews.title: Good binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Good binoculars for the price. I dont like the lanyard thing so much, i just kinda made my own but otherwise for the money the qaulity is pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: T-Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing binoculars! I think they go beyond the yardage advertised, have never spotted something I couldn't focus on with these!
customer_reviews.author: jellyroll1

customer_reviews.title: LOVE EM'
customer_reviews.text: These binos are fantastic for the price... Will use them for bow hunting this season.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: great binos
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for hunting and price was fair. Love them n have used them alot. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F. Rogina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very clear binoculars. Now if I could just see some deer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the binoculars. They have the magnification that I was looking for. Seem well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BINOCULARS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these binoculars for my son for Christmas. He said he loves them. I used them this past weekend. Clear view, easy to adjust. Love them, and the price was unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Mills

customer_reviews.title: High quality that I expect from a high standard name brand! Field tested in harsh field conditions...
customer_reviews.text: Very good outdoor looking glass! We used them at the range and use them in the field. The rubbery camo coating works very well. I can see where my buddies shots are going without having to use the scope on my rifle. (BTW my scope is a Bushnell as well!)
customer_reviews.author: Easyricer

customer_reviews.title: They were a good pair of binoculars but was hunting in light rain ...
customer_reviews.text: They were a good pair of binoculars but was hunting in light rain and got water inside of the lens. Can't get condensation out
customer_reviews.author: Josh Maniez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would like another couple pair can't find out how to find it again ?
customer_reviews.author: John Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bicnolars clear as it said,really enjoyin them.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price and definitely meet my needs for this upcoming season.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: good binoculars. look good and feel good
customer_reviews.text: good binoculars. look good and feel good. I compared them to a 10 x 50 Olympus binocular and they were dead even. these are just a tad bit smaller and more comfortable in the hands. I sent the Olympus back.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: LIKE
customer_reviews.text: I like it, IT DOES WHAT IT SAYS IT WILL DO
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Distance
customer_reviews.text: Great for deer hunting. Are a bit larger than my husband likes... will end up purchasing a small pair. Used on vacation to Yellow Stone they got the job done, but would have liked a little more distance at times.
customer_reviews.author: Shila Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Binculars
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use. Not heavy, focus well. Camo matches well with some other hunting items I have.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wished I had gotten better optics but it does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: FREDRICK LOCKHART

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome....bottom line. I picked these up to mess around in the backyard and watch birds with my kids and they have exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: JPC333

customer_reviews.title: Easy to focus
customer_reviews.text: Very clear out to several hundred yards. Easy to focus. Only reason I didn't give them the fifth star is the neck strap and pouch leave a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Poke
customer_reviews.text: So on the eyecup there is a sharp piece of plastic that cannot be filed nor removed. That pokes ya nicely and keeps you from using the bino's. No good no Good
customer_reviews.author: Ret Rography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice binoculars!!! Will probably be ordering another pair when they are back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Hillman

customer_reviews.title: unusable clips
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars themselves are nice, but the clips on the back are unusable for any of the harnesses available. Trying to find a way to modify the clips so the harness works.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Finegan

customer_reviews.title: the feel of these binos is nice. they are a bit bulky and on the ...
customer_reviews.text: the feel of these binos is nice. they are a bit bulky and on the heavy side. I would not want to hike with these on my neck all day. as far as how they work??? don't know they took forever to ship this order "weeks" and when it did arrive, it was broken.
customer_reviews.author: saywhat?

customer_reviews.title: don't believe everything you read
customer_reviews.text: nothing spectacular to write home about - they work and are not auto focus as stated.
customer_reviews.author: MASTER REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Saved BIG.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted. Great value. Product is durable and woods ready. Bass pro wanted double the price for camo.
customer_reviews.author: R Garcia

customer_reviews.title: maybe for kids but not adults
customer_reviews.text: the eye pieces dose not come together enough unless you have a really small head or your eyes are really close together just not enough adjustment
customer_reviews.author: no screws

customer_reviews.title: These probably would have been okay binoculars. I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: These probably would have been okay binoculars. I purchased them for my son for a christmas present. A package arrived with some knock off Oakley sunglasses. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Fields

product_meta.title: Bushnell PowerView 10 x 50mm Porro Prism Instafocus Binoculars, Realtree AP
product_meta.description: The Bushnell PowerView 10x 50mm All-Purpose Binoculars offers a combination of precision optics, durability and versatile styling that will make the most of your time outdoors. Rubber armoring ensures that these binoculars can sustain active use.
feature_bullets: Quality optics with stunning HD clarity
100% quality materials used and tested extensively
Beautiful design and durability built to last
Instafocus binoculars with 10x magnification and 50mm objective lenses
High quality BK-7 prism multi-coated optics for bright, clear, crisp viewing
Fold-down eyecups favor all viewers including eyeglass wearers
Realtree AP camouflage non-slip rubber armor absorbs shock while providing a firm grip
All-purpose binoculars for sporting events and nature viewing
